name: Pyrospace
description:
Pyrospace is a space ship builder game where you will be able to build a ship. Fight against procedurally generated enemies and upgrade your ship in turn. You will also be able to walk inside your ship and interact with the machines and people in your ship.

(Still in alpha build).

Youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4BRTi6PhJxJPG8bqWauCiA
